dmca.title: [EV1-C2294757F] Copyright Infringement Notification
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 28, 2006 5:32 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2294757F] Copyright Infringement Notification

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

 (multipart/alternative)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
To Center Of Light Serenity, and whomever it may concern: 
 
It has come to my attention that your website contains a poem titled
"Ten Rules of Love" which I wrote several years ago.  The poem is posted
here:  
http://www.soulsoothersonline.com/2003Issue/02-22-03.html 
 
This is an infringement upon my copyright and you are hereby notified
that unless this material is removed from your site, within 10 days,
criminal and civil complaints will be made against you for copyright
infringement under section 501 of title 17 United States Code, and
section 2319 of title 18, United States Code in U.S. District Court,
Washington, D.C. on Tuesday, January 9, 2007 
 
Furthermore, secondary notification is being sent to your hosting
provider, Everyones Internet of Houston, TX requesting that they either
remove the material from your site, or that an injunction will be sought
against them in U.S. District Court. 
 
Bernhard W. Behling
Silver Spring, MD
